item.title: Maths-Answer 08/10/2020
item.description: Question of the day_answers.08-10-2020 Range Today our topic is range, answers are here. The range of a set of data is 9. The lowest value is 12. The highest value is 21. The median of five number is 16; their mode is 6; their range is 18; their mean is 14. The numbers are 6, 6, 16, 18, 24. In mathematics test, six students scored 42, 76, 64, 51, 48, 59 and, in science test, they scored 86, 24, 41, 93, 65, 17.
